name.value: ITK Advance Decision to Refuse Treatment

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which contains concepts related to advance decision to refuse treatment (ADRT). The corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is Advance decision to refuse treatment preference findings simple reference set (foundation metadata concept) with Refset id 999002181000000105.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
